text.name: info1
text.text: LowRes NX is an open source fantasy console for creating

text.name: info2
text.text: tiny games. It's inspired by real 8-bit and 16-bit systems,

text.name: info3
text.text: and games are written in structured BASIC. It supports a

text.name: info4
text.text: D-pad, two action buttons and keyboard for input.
